name: Runnerpunk
description:
Runnerpunk is an endless-runner game I developed the last year as my first game with Unity.

I designed, programmed and created 99% percent of it in a few weeks, so it's a pretty small game, but I enjoyed it nonetheless so I decided to upload it.

Hope you like it too :)

How to play:

W / Up Arrow --> Go Up
S / Down Arrow --> Go Down
Space --> Shoot
Shift --> Toggle Autoshoot
R / Esc --> Restart

Enemies:

Soldier --> 50 pt.
Turret --> 100 pt.
Charger --> 200 pt.
Mine --> 0 pt.
Engineer --> 500 pt.
Barrels --> 25 pt.
Juggernaut --> 1000 pt.

MY RECORD: 79950 pt. (Can you do better?)
